title: Evan Rachel Wood calls out Paris Hilton for her comment on Millie Bobby Brown's Instagram pic
text:
Evan Rachel Wood has criticized Paris Hilton for her comment on Millie Bobby Brown's Tuesday Instagram post.

The 32-year-old Westworld actress took issue with the 38-year-old heiress describing the teenage Stranger Things star's look as 'hot'.

'She's 15,' Evan snapped back.

Evan Rachel Wood [L, in August 2019] has criticized Paris Hilton [R, this month] for her comment on Millie Bobby Brown's Instagram post

The photo in question showed the 15-year-old English actress in an animal print mini dress.

The Godzilla: King of the Monsters actress captioned the vintage-filtered pic: 'same dress but [very] different day [HEART EMOJI'].

And Paris was one of the top commenters, declaring 'That's hot [HEARTS EMOJIS]'.

That's when Evan called her out for the comment.

However, many fans leaped to Paris' defense by pointing out that 'That's hot' is the reality TV star's catchphrase.

'It’s a P.H saying,' pointed out one user.

Another explained that 'anyone familiar with [Paris] knows that the phrase "that's hot" just basically means "that's cool" or to show appreciation for something you think is awesome.'

However some weren't so restrained, with one user blasting the Thirteen star: '@evanrachelwood Get a life and stop trying to get relevant by bullying celebrities who are more popular than you are [EYE ROLL EMOJI]'.

The Godzilla: King of the Monsters actress captioned the vintage-filtered pic: 'same dress but [very] different day [HEART EMOJI']

Some others did side with the ex-wife of Jamie Bell, with @_chey.bomar_ writing 'I just find it disgusting that a grown woman finds it okay to call a 15 year old hot, catchphrase or not'.

Others took it even further, with one user tagging Wood in her reply: 'thank you!! This is pedophilia!'

And some even tried shaming Millie for her choice of wardrobe, with one fan writing, 'maybe she should dress like a 15 yr old right?'.

The actress plays Eleven in the hit TV series Stranger Things and was nominated for an Emmy award for her performances.

Her film debut came earlier this year with her role in Godzilla: King Of The Monsters.
description: The 32-year-old Westworld actress took issue with the 38-year-old heiress describing the teenage Stranger Things star's look as 'hot'. 'She's 15,' Evan snapped back.
